item.title: Resizing Persistent Volumes Using Kubernetes
item.description:
Feature gates:

  • enable ExpandPersistentVolumes feature gate (1.11⬆ default:ture).
  • enable PersistentVolumeClaimResize admission controller (1.11⬆ default:ture).

StorageClass:

  • Storage class’s allowVolumeExpansion field should set to true.
